[{"id":"dev-15990","entityId":"86-18112","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[gift certificate] activation on product level"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Stefan Seitz"},{"name":"created","value":"1541435722047"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15990"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo.fr/reseller/shop/premium
supplier emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Actual result

In order to activate Product voucher, supplier should activate them directly in Shop Editor .
https://www.regiondo.fr/reseller/shop/premium
This action will activate voucher for all products

Expected Result

Clickdummy: Clickdummy: https://marvelapp.com/46713di/screen/55532532

Add this action for every product separately

1.) Add 2 switchers in Dashboard > Manage offers > my offers > choose offer > Step 7 "Preview"
"Gift option"
"highlight tab"

The user has the option to highlight tap if "Gift option" is activated. The switcher 'Highlight tab' is not able to choose without activating 'Gift Voucher'.

For supplier that are selling voucher : Switcher should be turned on
For supplier that are not selling voucher : Switcher should be turned Off
For new registration : Switcher should be turned Off

2.) Remove the 'Gift option' and 'hightlight tab' in the shop configuration.
https://www.regiondo.com/reseller/shop/premium

Wording EN
  1. Gift option
  2. highlight gift option tab
Wording DE
  1. Geschenkoption
  2. Reiter 'Geschenkoption' hervorheben
Wording FR
  1. Option de cadeau
  2. Souligner l'onglet
How to transfer the current logic to the new logic?

For all current accounts:

  1. Grab the settings from the shop editor which are already been made and transfer them to the setting in step 7 of the offer creation.
    Reason: No current setting is lost

  2. For new offers the user can decide product based to activate gift voucher and highlight them.

Gift Option On.png","id":"89-60940","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/15590%20Activation%20On%20Product%20Level%20-%20Gift%20Option%20On.png?file=89-60940&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-61661","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-61661&c=true"},{"value":"existing-offer-preview-error-stacktrace.rtf","id":"89-63173","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/existing-offer-preview-error-stacktrace.rtf?file=89-63173&c=true"},{"value":"Screen Shot 2019-10-18 at 14.33.32.png","id":"89-63174","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/Screen%20Shot%202019-10-18%20at%2014.33.32.png?file=89-63174&c=true"},{"value":"grafik1574330087099.png","id":"89-64265","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/grafik1574330087099.png?file=89-64265&c=true"},{"value":"image1574331510331.png","id":"89-64266","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1574331510331.png?file=89-64266&c=true"},{"value":"image1574331565661.png","id":"89-64267","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1574331565661.png?file=89-64267&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"88-61286","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1570609541278,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-62674","author":"akhristich","authorFullName":"Alexander Khristich","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":true,"jiraId":null,"text":"

I consistently get an error after navigating to Preview step of an existing offer that was created before these changes to Gift Vouchers.

RTF file with a full stacktrace

Sreenshot:

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1571398601129,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63248","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on testing with demoaccount@regiondo.de

  1. The 2 switchers were added in the 7th step for offer creation ✓
    The switcher 'Highlight tab' is not able to choose without activating 'Gift Option'. ✓
    Both switchers are working as designed ✓
    Created new EN product id 112464 (named 'English new offer') - Translated it in FR and DE. It automatically displays the settings made in the product creation>Step 7 in all the languages it has been translated. Edited it a few times from all translations, editing is saved and it's working as designed ✓
    Edited existing product id 100772 (named 'test') - It automatically saves the changes in all the languages it has been created. working as designed ✓
    Also created a new bundle id 112465 (named 'Book it and bond') and used product id 112464. Was able to finish creating the bundle, no errors. Also, working on https://track.regiondo.com/issue/dev-15988 for adding gift option to bundles too ✓
    For supplier that are selling voucher : Switcher should be turned on - correct behavior ✓
    For supplier that are not selling voucher : Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓
    For new registration : Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓

  2. The 'Gift option' and 'Highlight tab' from Dashboard>Shop Configuration>Shop Editor>Product details>Booking widget were removed ✓

  3. Also checked the wording for EN, DE and FR - correct behavior ✓

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1573140075907,"updated":1573140280610,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63270","author":"m.hopei","authorFullName":"Maksym Hopei","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1573207105284,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63582","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on staging with demoaccount@regiondo.de

The 2 switchers were added in the 7th step for offer creation ✓
The switcher 'Highlight tab' is not able to choose without activating 'Gift Option'. ✓
Both switchers are working as designed ✓
Created new EN product id 23939 (named 'English offer') - Translated it in FR and DE. It automatically displays the settings made in the product creation>Step 7 in all the languages it has been translated. Edited it a few times from all translations, editing is saved and it's working as designed ✓
Edited existing product id 23614 (named '5 tickets only') - It automatically saves the changes in all the languages it has been created. working as designed ✓

For suppliers that are selling vouchers: Switcher should be turned on - correct behavior ✓
For suppliers that are not selling voucher: Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓
For new registration: Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓

The 'Gift option' and 'Highlight tab' from Dashboard>Shop Configuration>Shop Editor>Product details>Booking widget were removed ✓

Also checked the wording for EN, DE and FR - correct behavior ✓
Checked with several browsers ✓

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574066209469,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63717","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Checked on live with demoaccount@regiondo.de

The 2 switchers were added in the 7th step for offer creation ✓
The switcher 'Highlight tab' is not able to choose without activating 'Gift Option' ✓
Both switchers are working as designed ✓

Created new EN product id 118737 (named 'Activation on prod level for GC') - Translated it in FR and DE. It automatically displays the settings made in the product creation>Step 7 in all the languages it has been translated. Edited it a few times from all translations, editing is saved and it's working as designed ✓

For suppliers that are selling vouchers: Switcher should be turned on - correct behavior ✓
For suppliers that are not selling voucher: Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓
For new registration: Switcher should be turned Off - correct behavior ✓
The 'Gift option' and 'Highlight tab' from Dashboard>Shop Configuration>Shop Editor>Product details>Booking widget were removed ✓

Also checked the wording for EN, DE and FR - correct behavior ✓
Checked with several browsers ✓

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574328664999,"updated":1574330857332,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63720","author":"m.weierst","authorFullName":"Mia Weierst","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Bogdan Cumpanasu checked with:
supplier ID 10199, 18047
login bordt@jochen-schweizer.de, info@maxxarena.de

has gift option acitvated in shop editor - after publishing the ticket live all gift option has been deactivated. This not how it was expected:
For supplier that are selling voucher : Switcher should be turned on
For supplier that are not selling voucher : Switcher should be turned Off
For new registration : Switcher should be turned Off

e.g. for product ID: 23543

https://erlebniswelt-muenchen-betriebsgesellschaft-mbh.regiondo.de/bodyflying-fur-kinder-2-fluge-woche?_ga=2.269251186.285302666.1574060699-1272298052.1546951687



please fix. thx.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574330119419,"updated":1574331144996,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63726","author":"Bogdan_Cumpanasu","authorFullName":"Bogdan Cumpanasu","issueId":"dev-15990","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Mia Weierst Rechecked with demoaccount@regiondo.de
It's not reproducible for me. Besides the example in my previous comment, I've created again a new product, called 'Offer' (id 118832) and the settings were saved. When I got to the 7th step while creating the product, the switcher was turned off and I've turned it on, so the Gift Option is activate now for this new product.

After checking more carefully, the only issue I found is regarding existing products. By example, product 'Nineteen percent' (id 111898). Considering the supplier had the Gift Option active, when going to the product page, the gift option is active, just like in the requirements. https://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.com/nineteen-percent?_ga=2.166596286.1602826068.1574234014-1440379476.1569245603

The only issue I found is that in the 7th step, when trying to edit this product, the options appears as being turned off, although the option is available in the ticketshop:

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1574331656728,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"dev-15988","entityId":"86-18319","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Bundle] Add Gift certificate module for Bundle"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1543843645434"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15988"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity
